rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style entrance with Vastu alignment for positive energy flow. Provides natural light and ventilation.
Spacious living area designed with large windows to maximize natural light. Decorative ceiling fans for airflow.
Adjacent to the living room, ensuring a harmonious flow and adherence to Vastu principles.
Functional kitchen designed with modern amenities but retaining traditional Kerala styling. Proper ventilation and natural light through large windows.
West-facing master bedroom optimized for restful sleep. Large window placements and Vastu alignment for good energy flow.
Additional bedroom designed with natural light and cross ventilation in mind.
Connected to both master and guest bedrooms. Designed for privacy while ensuring proper airflow.
A triplex studio apartment designed to maximize space usage with multiple zones for living, sleeping and working. Features open layout to enhance natural light and ventilation.
A dedicated area for a swimming pool. The design incorporates traditional Kerala water management techniques ensuring proper drainage and natural light.
Two-car garage with sufficient space for parking and storage, designed to maintain harmony with the overall aesthetic of the building.
A large garden with indigenous plants and water features designed in line with Vastu to promote relaxation and harmony with nature.
